building-a-better-web-with-web-component.subtitle: Barcamp Cyberjaya 2017
building-a-better-web-with-web-component.title: Building a better web with Web Components and Polymer 2.0
building-a-better-web-with-web-component.description: Polymer is the most popular way to build your own Web Component, and they're natively supported in Chrome and Safari today, with other browsers joining the party soon. In this session, you will learn how Web Components and Polymer can help you build performant, maintainable web apps that unlock the full potential of the browser. You'll also hear about the latest advancements in the Polymer library that are bringing Polymer development closer to native than ever before, like ES6 class-based syntax and a suite of tools.

fishing-firebass-catching-a-ticket-to-go.title: Fishing Firebass: Catching a ticket to Google I/O 2017
fishing-firebass-catching-a-ticket-to-go.description: Firebass Challenge is an Alternate Reality Game (ARG) that lives across a variety of static web pages created by Googleâ€™s Firebase team. In this lightning talk, he will share his journey of becoming the first 100 people to win the free Google I/O 2017 ticket. He will also talk about how Firebase team and Insturment (A digital creative agency) created this amazing Alternate Reality Game while teaching the participant a little bit about the new version of Firebase.
